sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { StudentdataService } from 'src/app/shared/studentdata.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-addstudents', templateUrl: './addstudents.component.html', styleUrls: ['./addstudents.component.css'] }) export class AddstudentsComponent implements OnInit{ buttoncontrol=true; studdetail={ id:'', name:'', course:'', project:'', batch:'', status:'', placement:'' } constructor(public serv:StudentdataService,) }
